Uses of Class
game.resources.ResourceType

  • Packages that use ResourceType 
    Package Description
    game
    Contains all files concerning the gameplay.
    game.ai.aiplan
    Contains all files used by the AI to decide what to do.
    game.ai.monopoly
    Contains all files concerning monopoly cards played by the AI.
    game.ai.playertracker
    Contains all files the AI uses to track other players.
    game.bank
    Contains all files concerning the game bank.
    game.board.hexes
    Contains all files concerning hexes.
    game.player
    Contains all files concerning players.
    game.resources
    Contains all files concerning resources.
    network.protocol
    Contains all enums which define the Strings used by the protocol.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ResourceType Resources.convertIntToResourceType(int intResource)
      converts an int to a resourceType 0 = "Lumber", 1 = "Wool", 2 = "Grain", 3 = "Brick", 4 = "Ore".
